# clear_data_home { #bambi.clear_data_home }

`data.clear_data_home(data_home=None)`

Delete all the content of the data home cache.

## Parameters

| Name        | Type   | Description                                                                                   | Default   |
|-------------|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `data_home` |        | The path to Bambi data dir. By default a folder named `"bambi_data"` in the user home folder. | `None`    |
